page.title: 02Farming - Lower Park Farm.
page.content: {Farming in Lathom} The crops around Lathom are mainly barley and vegetables. There are not many Dairy Farms in Lathom. In our block there are several arable farms.We chose a particular farm in Lathom to do our research on. The name of the farm is Lower Park Farm. It's area is 130 acres. Its started off with 17 acres.In 1929 the farm (which was then a blacksmith's shop) was sold to the present farmer. Across from the farmhouse was a tree,it was called the battle tree because boys used to go there after school and fight. There is a saying if it was cut down the village would lose it's importance. In 1922 it was chopped down. Lathom estate was sold and the village lost its importance. The farmer's father told us this story. He still works on the farm with his son and grandsons.
